scripts.setup: pnpm install; if [ -f "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" ]; then ln -sf "$CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH/.env" .env; elif [ ! -f .env ]; then cp .env.example .env; fi; docker-compose up -d; for i in {1..30}; do docker exec cw_postgres pg_isready -U commonwealth >/dev/null 2>&1 && break; sleep 2; done; docker exec cw_postgres pg_isready -U commonwealth >/dev/null 2>&1 || (echo "Postgres not ready" && exit 1); pnpm migrate-db
